table.caption: Witherbloom Scholars
rows: Banelock, using concoctions of noxious ingredients for withering magic
Bleed doctor, drain the essence of living creatures to fuel sinister spells
Boon witch, brewing drafts to empower the living
Dreadbones, infusing dead tissue with magic to create Undead servants
Earthcroucher, connecting directly with the land to power nature magic
Leafbinder, using medicinal herbs to soothe wounds
Pestcatcher, harvesting life energy from the pests of the bayou
table.name: Scholars of Witherbloom; Witherbloom Scholars
